name: defender (itch) (Jezamae)
description:
Defend the balloon!

This game was inspired by the mobile game "Rise Up"

Setup Recommendations:

* Press 'Run Defender' to start

* Zoom out to see the entire square screen

* Best played with a mouse, but a trackpad would work just fine

** It may take a bit to load, it will though

*** Although it is not shown, my current high score for the 'control' gamemode is 208

**** All levels are possible, some levels are just really hard

Inquire at  jezamor214@gmail.com
